content.text: Hi there, what do you like to do for fun?
I love walking my dog, he's a beagle! I'm also a writer, so I spend a lot of time in solitude being creative.
That sounds nice! I like to spend time in my salon, I just got promoted!
Congrats! What kind of salon do you work at?
It's a hair salon, I've been working there for a few years now and really love it. I love making people feel good about themselves.
That's amazing! I'm almost finished with my degree in creative writing, and I'm looking forward to getting a job as a writer.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I'm excited to get started.
What do you like to write about?
I like to write short stories and poems, I'm also working on a novel.
That's awesome! I love to read, so I'll be sure to check out your work when it's finished.
Thanks! I'd love to hear what you think.
